author: stephen_dalton
title: Excellent stay
text: Myself and my girlfriend stayed here for the second time in march 2017 and the stay was excellent complimented by a first class dinner at helenas. Location is top notch as is the service and the cleanliness of the rooms whilst breakfast is always a treat in the courtyard. Only slight con, which is really a function of the great central location is that the noise can be a factor. This time around we could hear early morning refuse collection whilst last time, we had a rooom on the ground floor which was adjacent to a staff area which was quite noisy. Overall though, thoroughly recommended but perhaps ensure a room not on the ground floor.
